task.name: Update_Or_Modify_Record
task.description:
A task performing a rest POST request using a json request body.
This template supports only basic authentication, for more advanced authentication settings, please modify the template according to the rest-assured documentation: https://github.com/rest-assured/rest-assured/wiki/Usage#authentication

variable.description: Simple JSON structure describing column and their values to be updated. Note that in case of a PUT, all non modified fields with values must be present as well in the json body.
variable.name: REQUEST_BODY

variable.description: Name of the table which contains the record that will be updated or modified.
variable.name: TABLE_NAME

variable.description: Unique ID (SYS_ID column) of the record to update or modify.
variable.name: SYS_ID

variable.description: If true, disable SSL certificate verification.
variable.name: SSL_DISABLE_CHECK

variable.description: If true, print the full request and response content in the task output.
variable.name: DEBUG

variable.description: Format of the HTTP response body.
variable.name: RESPONSE_FORMAT

variable.description: Format of the HTTP request body.
variable.name: REQUEST_FORMAT

variable.description: Which data to extract in the response if json, xml or html format is selected. It uses the GPath notation.
variable.name: RESPONSE_PATH

variable.description: Return field display values (true), actual values (false), or both (all).
variable.name: SYSPARM_DISPLAY_VALUE

variable.description: True to exclude Table API links for reference fields.
variable.name: SYSPARM_EXCLUDE_REFERENCE_LINK

variable.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return in the response. Defaults to all fields.
variable.name: SYSPARM_FIELDS

variable.description: Set field values using their display value (true) or actual value (false).
variable.name: SYSPARM_INPUT_DISPLAY_VALUE

variable.description: True to suppress auto generation of system fields.
variable.name: SYSPARM_SUPPRESS_AUTO_SYS_FIELD

variable.description: True to access data across domains if authorized.
variable.name: SYSPARM_QUERY_NO_DOMAIN
